node.title: Hike to le col d‚Äôhurti√®res
node.description:
Read the full page

== Level ==

* üîµ medium for good hikers
* üî¥ hard for noobs

== EN/FR ==
We speak English/French in all our events. Don't be worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas bilingue.

== Chartreuse : le col d‚ÄôHurti√®res from Mont St Martin ==
Distance: 14km
Time: 5h of hike + 1h lunch + 45 min drive
Drop : 1000m

== Car share ==
Meet at ¬´ Palluel ¬ª (end of tram E)
Beginning of the hike at parking Nami√®re 38120 Mont-Saint-Martin
Car share will cost 2‚Ç¨ per person

== Rules ==
\- Don't be late
\- Do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
\- If you finally can't join us\, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation\. That way\, we won't wait for you
\- If you are a driver and can't join\, please send me a message through meetup ASAP\, that way I can remove available seats
\- Don't throw any dump in nature

== What do you need ==
\- Hiking shoes
\- Hiking poles \(if you need\)
\- Water \+ food for lunch \+ some snack
\- Clothes for wind/cold/rain
\- Money for car share
\- Sunglasses
\- Sunscreen

== Covid ==
\- Don't come if you feel sick\, have fever\, are contact case
\- Wear your mask in cars
\- You are responsible to your own health\, so respect barrier gestures\, social distancing

If you have any questions, please ask !

node.title: üö¥ üèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Group Velo Ride: Lake Paladru (Lac de Paladru) 50km
node.description:
(Event Under Development; it will be updated during Friday and Saturday)

A substitute event for those that were originally RSVP'd to ride to Vizille and still want to ride on Sunday 1st may:

* This will be a 50km ride way (instead of a 20km ride to Vizille)
* This ride will include a 600+ meter climb (as opposed to 0m elevation change To Vizille; for Comparison, a ride to Col de Port would be \~1000m climb/elevation gain)

So this will be for a bit more-experienced cyclists, or those that wish to become so (no one will be left behind)

=== Agenda (DRAFT) ===

* 08:30-09:00: Queue at Gare Grenoble, Coffee ‚òïÔ∏è
* 09:00-11:45: Ride to Paladru, stopping as needed.
* 11:45-13:00: Picnic / Swimming (negotiable based on air and water temperature)
* 13:00-15h+: Ride [back] to Grenoble

(We may stop for Fuel ‚òïÔ∏èü´íüßÄ ü•ê at some point)

=== üö¥‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Route üö¥===

https://www.mapmyride.com/routes/view/4971648034/

(I'm unfamiliar with the route, so please ensure your cell phones are 100% charged)

=== Beaches ===
üèä ü§îüèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§î
I understand that Lake Paladru is private property, but there are municipal beaches that should be open to the public. We may need to encircle the lake en Velo to find a good spot. Please bring a few euros in case they're charging an entrance fee.

=== Note üìù ===

I'm looking for riders/persons more-familiar with Lake Paladru, as I've never ridden there myself, so I'm unfamiliar with the best beaches/spots for swimming/picnic. I understand some of them are private‚Ä¶.

=== What to Bring ===

\* Water, 2L minimum (there should be fountains along the way; we'll make note of them for future events)
\* Snacks (Proteins and Complex Carbohydrates)
\* ID Wallet etc. üí∞ üíµ üí∑
\* Cash/Cards
\* Any medications you have
\* Bicycle Safety: Gloves/Gants, Lunettes/Eye Protection. Casque/Helmet
\* Flat tire/tyre spare repair kit (Pump, Tube, tools)
\* Towel üëô
\* Sunscreen/Creme de Solaire üåû
\* Chapeau / Hat üåû

node.title: ü•æüî¥ Hike: Lac de la Thuile ü™ûü•∞
node.description:
üí° Read the full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üìÖ April 29 - 7pm: more cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Paulo (5), Thomas (5), Dima (5) & Florent (4), Paul (4)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ü•æüî¥ Hike: Lac de la Thuile ü™ûü•∞ ==

* üîµ medium for good hikers
* üî¥ hard for noobs üôÉ

Meet at 9:30am at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* OSM: [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* Maps: [https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6](https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6)

We ride our cars for about 30m. Then park our car(s) near Montm√©lian:

* [https://www.osm.org/way/1043584128](https://www.osm.org/way/1043584128)
* [https://goo.gl/maps/3qFujLfXA6NG3RpH9](https://goo.gl/maps/3qFujLfXA6NG3RpH9)

We will "climb" (\~1000m elevation during morning) to reach the "Massif des Bauges. Then do a relatively flat hike (\~200m) around the lake. Then go back to the cars by another way üòé

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/XvVr1Bvb](https://s.42l.fr/XvVr1Bvb) (GraphHopper) or [https://s.42l.fr/SEwPWGsq](https://s.42l.fr/SEwPWGsq) (BRouter)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX track on your phone by following the tuto on THE official GAC website ü§©üòÖü§£ [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/)
Distance: 18.5km
Time: \~6/7h of hike + 1h launch break + 1h üöó
D+: 1220m

=== üöó share ===
Car share will cost 6‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + highway toll + "compensation" to get more drivers). üò∑ You have to wear a mask in car. Fuel is very expensive at this time...

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/en/coronavirus-covid-19](https://www.gouvernement.fr/en/coronavirus-covid-19)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* ü•æ Hiking shoes (or any good/non slippery shoes)
* Hiking pole (if you want)
* ü©≥ü©± swimsuit + towel
* üßÉ Water + üç´ Some snack + ü•ó food for lunch
* Clothes for wind, rain (if any)
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)
* üíµ Money for car share (exact change in cash)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: ü•æHike: No car, no bus, hike directly to Fort du Saint-Eynard
node.description:
üí° Read the full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

==ü•æ No car, no bus, just hike from Grenoble to Fort St Eynard ==
üî¥ hard for beginners
üîµ medium-hard for good hikers

**What to expect:**
No technical difficulty but a sporty hike to reach the fort of Mont St-Eynard from Grenoble directly. We will take the bus back from Col de Vance or hike back (depending on 1. we feel our legs or not üòã 2. we kept a good pace to catch the bus at 17:24h, else we hike back ü§©).

Essentially,
**Bastille -> Mont Jalla -> almost Mont Rachais -> Col de Vance ->** **Mont St-Eynard fort -> Col de Vance -> (if tired or late)----> bus back to Grenoble**
**(else)** **\-\-\-\-\> hike back to Grenoble**

So, we will try to keep a good pace!

There is an individual option to take the bus back even before without going up to the Fort from Col de Vance if you don't feel like it (check bus details).

Distance: \~15km (\~20km if we hike back too)
Time: \~7h of hike + 3\*30 min breaks
Ascent+ : \~1365m üî•
Descent- : \~800m
Max Elevation: 1350m
Min Elevation: 215m

**Topo & GPX track:**
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eLa8U1qCV34gvOk9oAuI8zr-b_Nh3HyF/view?usp=sharing

**RDV:**
Meet before 08:30h sharp at Fontaine du Lion
105 Rue Saint-Laurent, 38000 Grenoble

**Bus details** (if you want to shorten the route):
If too tired, you can individually choose to take the bus back from Col de Vance without climbing to Fort St Eynard. Check hours: https://www.tag.fr/ftp/fiche_horaires/fiche_horaires_2014/HORAIRES_62.pdf

== ‚ùî **What do you need** ‚ùî ==
\- üíµ Money for bus ticket and mask
\- üßÉ Water \(atleast 2L\) \+ üç´ snacks \+ Food \+ ü§§extra food for sharing \(highly recommended\)
\- Your smile and happiness üòÅ

**Equipment:**
\- Hiking shoes \(must\)
\- Hiking poles \(recommended\)
\- Cap \(recommended\)
\- Clothes: layer\-up
\- üåû Sun\-cream / üòé Sun glasses \(highly recommended\)

**See how waiting list works:**
https://binnette.github.io/GAC/AboutMeetup/WaitingList.html

**GPX Tutorial:**
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX track on your phone. Tuto: https://binnette.github.io/GAC

If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú

üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
üò∑ Covid rules: https://www.gouvernement.fr/en/coronavirus-covid-19

== üí° **Rules** üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and sharing food and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask Albin by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: ‚ùÑÔ∏è Hike: Circuit la Pin√©a - Chalet du Charmant Som WINTER EDITION ‚ùÑÔ∏è
node.description:
**Details**
üí° Read the full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==
None

==ü•æ Take **Bus** to Col de Port and then hike to la Pin√©a and then to Chalet du Charmant Som - WINTER EDITION ==

üî¥ medium-hard for beginners
üîµ easy-medium for good hikers
‚ö´ impossible if you can't wake up early on a Sunday :)

No Albin-level experience here! So tread carefully! :)

**What to expect:**

* Planned by bus but cars welcome
* We will go to the slender summit of the Pin√©a (a beautiful 360 view on clear days) and then head to the chalets of Charmant Som (with a Fromagerie with amazing Tomme and fresh Yogurt at the base, and a wonderful view at the top).

This is written by Vaibhav, there will be no such thing as the chalet is closed in winter.

* No risk passages, except for the final steep climb to La Pin√©a, most of the path is proper route. The track to Pin√©a is covered by trees so expected to be icy-snow, and muddy as usual. Weather prediction is partially sunny on Sunday for now.

**Distance:** 13km
**Time:** \~5h of hike + 40min breaks + 1.5h bus back and forth
**Elevation+** : \~600m

**Topo & GPX track:**
https://drive.google.com/file/d/19LZKNKwe6FkONqgaGz1Mb-Dcs5_YzH42/view?usp=sharing

**Alternatively (Google Maps):**
https://www.google.com/maps/d/u/0/edit?mid=16nAltUQ6UT4h2xuFpb5G_af2roAK_uxL&usp=sharing

**RDV:**
\- Meet before 07:45h sharp at Notre\-Dame \- Musee
https://goo.gl/maps/BetPXLuG78NNCfWN9

**Bus details:**

* Bus departs at 08:10 am so no room for delays :( The next bus would be in 2 hours so plan accordingly
* Also there can be a line so be early to surely get a seat
* Bus fare is 1.60 Euros (buy 2 tickets at the station).
* The bus takes about 35 min one-way. The last bus from Col de Porte is at 18:30, we will take the one at 17:10.

**Ride details (if any):**
Ride for about 35 mins. Then park our car(s) at the restaurant 3 sommet near Col de Porte

https://maps.app.goo.gl/CcU6c1Wju7EU1Ski9

== ‚ùî **What do you need** ‚ùî ==
\- üíµ Money for bus ticket \(buy 2 at Notre Dame Musee\) and to buy delicious Cheese and Yogurt :p
\- üßÉ Water \+ üç´ Some snack \+ Food \+ ü§§extra Food for sharing \(highly recommended\)
\- Face masks for the Bus
\- Your smile and happiness üòÅ

Equipment:
\- Hiking shoes \(must\)
\- Long gaiters \(keep for comfort if fresh snow sections\)
\- Crampons \(recommended/keep for comfort on icy sections\)
\- Hiking pole \(recommended\)
\- Winter gloves \(highly recommended\)
\- Neck warmer/Beanie/anything to cover ears \(recommended\)
\- Clothes for snow\, wind \(layer\-up\)
\- üåû Sun\-cream / üòé Sun glasses

**See how waiting list works:**
https://binnette.github.io/GAC/AboutMeetup/WaitingList.html

**GPX Tutorial:**
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX track on your phone. Tuto: https://binnette.github.io/GAC

=== üöó share ===
No car share. We take the bus.

If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú

üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
üò∑ Covid rules: https://www.gouvernement.fr/en/coronavirus-covid-19

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and sharing food and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.

If you have any questions, please ask!
See you! GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask Albin by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: ‚ùÑÔ∏èüî¥ Snowshoe: Sappey to Emeindras ‚òÉÔ∏è
node.description:
üí° Read the full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üìÖ April 2 - 11am: more cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Joao (5)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ‚ùÑÔ∏èüî¥ Snowshoe: Sappey to Emeindras ‚òÉÔ∏è ==
Bring your showshoes or rent them in Grenoble. There are no shop open in Sappey.

* ‚ö´Ô∏è hardcore for noobs üôÉ
* üîµ/üî¥ medium/hard for good hikers

Meet at 9am at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* OSM: [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* Maps: [https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6](https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6)

We ride our cars for about 40m. Then park our car(s) at "Sappey":

* [https://www.osm.org/way/223645949](https://www.osm.org/way/223645949)
* [https://goo.gl/maps/Bn43jvXLQvwVmNJP9](https://goo.gl/maps/Bn43jvXLQvwVmNJP9)

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/18ETco2a](https://s.42l.fr/18ETco2a)
‚ñ∂üí° Show GPX track on your phone. Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/)
Distance: 14km (or 11km for shortcut)
Time: \~3/4h of hike + 50h üöó
D+: 1000m (or 700m for shortcut)

=== üöó share ===
Car share will cost 2‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers). üò∑ You have to wear a mask in car. Fuel is very expensive at this time...

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/en/coronavirus-covid-19](https://www.gouvernement.fr/en/coronavirus-covid-19)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* ‚ùÑÔ∏è Snowshoes (no shop in Sappey)
* Hiking pole (if you want)
* üßÉ Water + üç´ Some snack
* üå¨ Clothes for wind, rain (if any)
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* ü•ô Food for launch
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)
* üíµ Money for car share (exact change in cash)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, concert, etc), join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).
